quotes.author: - Goji Insurance
quotes.desc: Before Plotly, we were entangled in an enterprise BI quagmire. Our system was large, expensive to maintain in both time and effort, and slow to adapt to our fast-changing needs. Plotly was the “big BI” killer we had been waiting for

quotes.author: - Olark
quotes.desc: At Olark, plot.ly allows us to rapidly visualize our data and build easy-to-share, interactive dashboards. This all came at an orders of magnitude lower price than full-fledged business intelligence solutions and seamlessly integrated with our existing analysis pipelines.

sections.title: Whitelabel Platforms with Plotly Enterprise
sections.body: Want to run Plotly on your own servers? Plotly helps digital news outlets deploy Plotly Enterprise servers with their own branding and user experience.

sections.title: Plotly Pew Research graph collection
sections.body: Curious how publication-quality, interactive graphs look in Plotly? Explore Plotly's collection of Pew Research graphs for inspiration.

sections.title: Interactive maps like the New York Times
sections.body: Plotly has the most fully featured D3.js map editor available online. Plotly maps are all drawn with D3.js, the same Javascript library used by the New York Times.
